sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function TermsAndConditions() { return (

Terms and Conditions

By registering and using MyTeacher App, you agree to the following terms and conditions. These terms govern your use of the platform as a tutor or student and ensure a safe, respectful, and professional learning environment.

  • Accurate Information: You agree to provide truthful, complete, and up-to-date information during registration and while using the platform.
  • Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
  • Professional Conduct: All sessions must be conducted respectfully, ethically, and professionally. Harassment, discrimination, or inappropriate behavior will not be tolerated.
  • Payment & Refunds: Payments for sessions must be made through approved methods. Refunds are subject to platform policies and may require review by the support team.
  • Platform Misuse: Any misuse of the app—including spamming, impersonation, or fraudulent activity—may result in suspension or termination of your account.
  • Legal Compliance: All communication and content shared on the platform must comply with applicable laws, including data protection, copyright, and anti-harassment regulations.
  • Session Cancellations: Tutors and students must adhere to the cancellation policy. Late cancellations or no-shows may incur penalties or affect your reputation score.
  • Intellectual Property: Content uploaded or shared by tutors (e.g., tutorials, notes) remains their intellectual property unless otherwise agreed. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
  • Platform Updates: MyTeacher App reserves the right to update features, policies, or terms at any time. Continued use of the app implies acceptance of these changes.
  • Support & Disputes: For any issues, users should contact support. Disputes will be handled in accordance with platform procedures and may involve mediation or review.

Need assistance?

Email us at{' '} support@myteacherapp.com

); } export default TermsAndConditions;
